name: The Adventures of Bally - A Platformer - Two Player
name_original: The Adventures of Bally - A Platformer - Two Player
description:
Hello, this is my first game I am making that is on Construct 3. 

You and you friend are Bally. You both need to get to the end portal by going up. This is the first game of a series of maybe 3 two player games.  

**This game is under construction and there might be a few bugs. Sorry for the inconvenience**

You can find sequels and different versions of the game here: Bally 1 player
